    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/cygnet_common

Common code used in the Cygnet project.

* Free software: BSD license

Installation
============

::

    pip install cygnet_common

Documentation
=============

https://cygnet-common.readthedocs.org/

Development
===========

To run the all tests run::

    tox
